content: होतृ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (त्री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [हु-तृच्] Sacrificing, offering oblations with fire; वहति विधिहुतं या हविर्या च होत्री <ls>Ś. 1. 1.</ls> {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A sacrificial priest, especially one who recites the prayers of the Ṛgveda at a sacrifice. {@--2@} A sacrificer; <ls>R. 1. 62.</ls> <ls n="R. 1.">82</ls>; <ls>Ms. 11. 36.</ls> {@--3@} An epithet of Agni.
होत्री The offerer of oblations, one of the eight forms of Śiva; <ls>Ś. 1. 1.</ls>
